reviewText: A great way to travel from your own home.
Well presented by the always-amiable Martin Clunes.  Interesting and entertaining.  Great value..

It wouldn't play on our DVD.  I saw nothing on the site that said it was for England only.  some of the others mentioned that so I specifically looked for that warning.  I sent it ,as a gift, anyway, and the recipient found that he could change his computer to play that format.  Should have been mentioned on the site that it wouldln't play on US DVD's/
No one told me it did not come in US viewing -capacity!!?? I had to send it back!!! E Mackenzie  0  rating!
